name: Supernova (itch) (dxk2294)
description:
We highly recommend downloading and playing the standalone executable binaries!

Keep the Starship Ludum alive, charge your FTL jump drive, and escape from the impending supernova!

Objective

In order to escape before the local star goes supernova, you will need to charge your FTL drive, and quickly! Manage and allocate your remaining functional ship parts to keep the Startship Ludum up and running long enough to escape! Keep in mind, there are many operations on the ship that will need to be kept running, and your sensors indicate several anomalies are threatening your ship’s systems!

Components

To keep the Starship Ludum alive and running, you will need to efficiently allocate your remaining stockpile of the following components:

  • Batteries
  • Motors
  • Coolant
  • Compressors
  • Computers
Failure

If you fail to maintain life support, your starship may escape, but you won’t.

If you fail to charge your jump drive in time, the consequences will be disastrous...

Notes/Changelog

At 10PM on the day of the Ludum Dare submission, we re-uploaded Supernova with a hotfix that resolved issues where the player could get into an un-winnable state.
